entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 1:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning late this evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain along the coast. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain along the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening then changing to 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
